=A0Salveo and his team along with Talon=A0are easily able to step inside th=
e Ark, the thick doors sliding open just enough to allow them entrance and =
sliding closed as they stepped inside. 
=A0
After a moment dim light flicke=
r and then blink into existance, showing an Ark just as the Maiximals shoul=
d remember it, although the walls are scorched as if they had seen some sma=
ll parts of the war that had transpired outside. 
=A0
"Come on in . . . *co=
ugh* *cough* . . . =A0fellows." Comes=A0Lord Elder's tired voice comes over=
 the loud speakers. "The defences are comming back online, slowly but surel=
y."
=A0
A short pause, and then the lights flicker and come on full strengt=
h. "I am in the command center." Lord Elder's voice again comes for the lou=
d speakers, a little stronger now. 
=A0
(TAG)
=A0
